name: MATH 150 D100
prerequisites: Pre-Calculus 12 (or equivalent) with a grade of at least B+, or MATH 100 with a grade of at least B-, or achieving a satisfactory grade on the Simon Fraser University Calculus Readiness Test.

name: MATH 152 D100
prerequisites: MATH 150 or 151 or 155, with a minimum grade of C-; or MATH 154 or 157, with a grade of at least B.

name: MATH 155 D100
prerequisites: MATH 150, 151 or 154, with a minimum grade of C-; or MATH 157 with a grade of at least B.

name: MATH 157 D100
prerequisites:
Pre-Calculus 12 (or equivalent) with a grade of at least B, or MATH 100 with a grade of at least C, or achieving a
satisfactory grade on the Simon Fraser University Calculus
Readiness Test.

name: MATH 190 OL01
prerequisites:
Pre-Calculus 11 or Foundations of Mathematics 11 (or equivalent)
with a grade of at least B, or SFU FAN X99 course with a grade of at least C, or achieving a satisfactory grade on the Simon Fraser University Quantitative Placement Test. This course may not be counted toward the Mathematics minor, major or honours degree requirements. Students who have taken, have received transfer credit for, or are currently taking MATH 150, 151, 154 or 157 may not take MATH 190 for credit without permission from the Department of Mathematics. Intended to be particularly accessible to students who are not specializing in mathematics.

name: MATH 232 D400
prerequisites: MATH 150 or 151 or MACM 101, with a minimum grade of C-; or MATH 154 or 157, both with a grade of at least B.

name: MATH 240 D200
prerequisites: MATH 150 or 151 or MACM 101, with a minimum grade of C-; or MATH 154 or 157, both with a grade of at least B.

name: MATH 251 D100
prerequisites: MATH 152 with a minimum grade of C-; or MATH 158 with a grade of at least B. Also, for students in the life sciences, MATH 154 with a minimum grade of C- and MATH 155 with a minimum grade of A-. Recommended: It is recommended that MATH 240 or 232 be taken before or concurrently with MATH 251.

name: MATH 254 D100
prerequisites: MATH 240 or 232, and 251, all with a minimum grade of C-. MATH 240 or 232 may be taken concurrently.

name: MATH 260 D100
prerequisites: MATH 152 with a minimum grade of C-; or MATH 155 or 158, with a grade of at least B; MATH 232 or 240, with a minimum grade of C-.

name: MATH 336 D100
prerequisites: Students must apply to and receive permission from the co-op co-ordinator at least one, preferably two, terms in advance. They will normally be required to have completed 45 units with a GPA of 2.5. This course will be graded on a pass/withdraw basis. A course fee is required.

name: MATH 337 D100
prerequisites: MATH 336 and permission of the co-op co-ordinator; students must apply at least one term in advance.

name: MATH 338 D200
prerequisites: MATH 340 or 332, with a minimum grade of C- or permission of the instructor.

name: MATH 342 D100
prerequisites: MATH 240 or 232, with a minimum grade of C-, and one additional 200-level MATH or MACM course.

name: MATH 426 D100
prerequisites: MATH 242 and (MATH 348 or STAT 380), all with a minimum grade of C-.

name: MATH 436 D100
prerequisites: MATH 337 and permission of the co-op co-ordinator; students must apply at least one term in advance.

name: MATH 437 D100
prerequisites: MATH 436 and permission of the co-op co-ordinator; students must apply at least one term in advance.

name: MATH 486 D100
prerequisites: MATH 437 and permission of the co-op co-ordinator. Students must apply at least one term in advance.

name: MATH 875 G100
prerequisites: Only available to students in Mathematics PhD program. Corequisite: MATH 876.

name: MATH 876 G100
prerequisites: Only available to students in Mathematics PhD program. Corequisite: MATH 875.
